exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: constructor; hnf. + intros; exists; hnf; intuition. + intros x y z H1 H2. destruct H1 as [f1 [H1 H1']], H2 as [f2 [H2 H2']]. exists (comp_pi f1 f2). split. - hnf; intros; eapply in_dom_comp_pi; eauto. - hnf; intros. rewrite H1', H2'; auto.
